description: Defines a Flutter widget called NoteCard, which displays a preview of a note including title, content, tags, and last modified time, with tap and delete interactions.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a summary preview of a Note with title, content, tags, and edit time, and handles tap and delete actions.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the note card, including styling, content display, and interaction handlers.

methods.name: _timeAgo
methods.description: Returns a human-readable string representing the time elapsed since the note was last modified.
